TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IllegalFormatException extends Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException

Docs.summary: An IllegalFormatException is thrown when a format string that contains either an illegal syntax or format specifier is transferred as a parameter.

remarks.para: An IllegalFormatException is thrown when a format string that contains either an illegal syntax or format specifier is transferred as a parameter. Only subclasses inheriting explicitly from this exception are allowed to be instantiated.

Docs.param: A containing a Java Native Interface (JNI) object reference.
Docs.summary: A constructor used when creating managed representations of JNI objects; called by the runtime.

remarks.para: This constructor is invoked by the runtime infrastructure () to create a new managed representation for a Java Native Interface object.
